Module.Name: global-dump-sql
Module.AfterInstallMessage: Just providing the global name results in a full global dump. Example: USER>zn "irisapp" IRISAPP>d $system.SQL.Shell() SQL Command Line Shell ... Enter , 'q' to quit, '?' for help. [SQL]IRISAPP>>select TOP 5 * from zrcc_G.dump where zrcc_G.Dump('^%SYS','"JOURNAL"')=1
